skills.name: Death Kiss
skills.description: Passive: 死吻 is sure to deal critical damage when behind her target and cannot perform one when in front of it. Her first critical damage deals 125% damage. every 1% of critical damage chance 死吻 will deal 0.5% additional damages. She can deal at most 1500 damages to a target.

skills.name: Arc Light
skills.description: 阿轲 send two attacks in the desired direction, each dealing 175/200/225/250/275/300（+65% Physical）physical damages.

skills.name: Flower Wink
skills.description: 阿轲 rapidly move to the designated spot attacking then the closest enemy dealing 350/390/430/470/510/550（+100% Physical）physical damage and marking the target for 10s. Each time the marked target is hit by 阿轲 it's move speed will be reduced by 50% for 1s (1s cooldown). 阿轲 Will also received 30% less damages from this target. Only one enmy can be marked at a time.

skills.name: Fantasy Dance
skills.description: Ultimate: 阿轲 Hides for 3s. when hidden she recovers 100/150/200（+25% Physical）Health every 0.5s and gains 40% move speed. When hitting an enemy, the stealth is broken. but for 3s her attacks will gain 150/175/200 strength, she will also gain 30% move speed for each hit on enemies (for 1s). Passive: When killing or on assist, 阿轲 recovers all her abilities cooldown

skills.name: Bear
skills.description: Passive: After entering combat 不知火舞 next basic attack gain 100（+100% Mag）magic damages and will repel the target. 不知火舞 abilities roll upon ending and 不知火舞 will gain 50% move speed for 0.5s.

skills.name: Circling flame
skills.description: 不知火舞 will rise in the air dealing 550/620/690/760/830/900（+73% Mag）magic damages to enemies in range. She will fly for 0.75s and recover 25 Health if a target is hit.

skills.name: Fan slap
skills.description: 不知火舞 send her fan dealing 500/590/680/770/860/950（+100% Mag）magic damags to the first enemy hit. It will also reduce target speed by 90% for 1s and reduce it's magic resist by 50/100/150/200/250/300 for 3s. Upon hit 不知火舞 will recover 25 Life.

skills.name: Certain death
skills.description: Ultimate: 不知火舞 dash forward dealing 800/1000/1200（+110%法术加成）magic damages to enemies and reducing their damages by 20%/25%/30%.不知火舞 will recover 25 life if she hits an enemy.
Passive: When receiving damage 蔡文姬 gain 70% move speed for 2s, she will also heal herself of 250（+50% Magic). Can be triggered every 10s
蔡文姬 play for 3s increasing her speed by 20% and healing her and allies nearby by 60/66/72/78/84/90（+20% Magic）every 0.5s

蔡文姬 send a sound wave dealing 60/66/72/78/84/90（+20% Magic） magic damages and stuning each enemy hurt for 0.75s. If another enmy is in range the wave will be reflected on him. up to 6 targets can be hit. A target can be hit only 2 times but with only half damages the second time.

Ultimate: play music healing each 0.5s the hero (in range) with least health of 150/200/250（+35%法术加成）health. At the same time all nearby allies gain 200/250/300 physical and magical resist. Song last 5s

skills.name: Dis-hearted
skills.description: Passive: When one of 妲己 ability hit an enemy it reduces it"s magic resistance by 30~72. Can be stacked 3 times

skills.name: Soul attack
skills.description: 妲己 send a shockwave dealing 520/585/650/715/780/845（+122% Magic）magic damages to enemies hit

skills.name: Idol charm
skills.description: 妲己 send her charms dealing to the first target hit 285/320/355/390/425/460（+66% Magic）magic damage and stunning for 1.5s

skills.name: Queen adoration
skills.description: Ultimate: 妲己 send 5 fox fire balls dealing 325/405/485（+75% Magic）magic damage. Balls can hit a same target but additional balls deal only 50% of the initial damage to this target
Passive: 大乔 will increase the nearest ally in range move speed by 40～60. increase depending on her level.

skills.name: jumping carp flow
skills.description: 大乔 send a carp in a direction dealing 550/700/850/1000（+56%法术加成）to the first enemy. when hit the path will become a river for 4s granting 30% move speed to allies within.
大乔 will summon a typhoon for 4s. At the end all heroes in range will be attracted in the center. It will also restore life and grant 25% move speed for 3s
Ultimate: 大乔 summon a wave dealing 180/210/240/270（+20% Magic）magic damage and sliencing enemies within

Ultimate: 大乔 summon for 8s a large scale vortex dealing 660/830/1000（+72%法术加成）magic damages to enemies. During this time allied can be transported to the center. Allies already inside gain 40% Attack speed.

skills.name: Dialect: flower print
skills.description: Passive: When hitting an enemy with an ability  leave a mark on him for 8s. after 4 marks  recover 100 hit points. It will also damage enemy for 160 (+64 Mag) true damages and lower their movement speed by 90% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Fall: Red rain
skills.description: will send a flower ball. It will fly a while and then come back. each enemy touched wii get 180/220/260/300/340/380 (+57% Mag) magic damages.

skills.name: Fate: rancor
skills.description: will appear immediatly at the position throwing three balls targeting closest enemies. Each ball deals 140/155/170/185/200/215 (+24% Mag) magic damages. If the ball hit enemies,  cooldown will be reduced by 4s

skills.name: Burst: magnificent
skills.description: Ultimate:  will great a burst at the given position dealing upon start and end 210/245/280 (+50% Mag)magic damages. Red rain and Fate rancor triggered within will have reduced cooldown

skills.name: Night Whisper
skills.description: Passive: whenever hitting an enemy 1 stack is added. 4 stack trigger an explosion, adding a new stack, dealing 150（+80% Phys）magic damages to nearby enemies and slowing their cooldown recovery by 1s. When triggering an ability or recovering her umbrella 阿离 send an additional knife dealing 30% Physical additional damage

skills.name: Cens Moon
skills.description: 阿离 wink at a direction, sending there her umbrella if she has it. Passive: when triggering her ability 阿离 can trigger it a second time to go to her umbrella spot. When she does not have her umbrella 阿离 gain 50 points move speed but has 20% reduced damages.

skills.name: Frost dance
skills.description: If she has her umbrella 阿离 fly with it dealing to enemies in range twice 120/144/168/192/216/240（+40% Phys）magical damages. Passive: when triggering her ability 阿离 can trigger it a second time to go to her umbrella spot. When she does not have her umbrella 阿离 gain 50 points move speed but has 20% reduced damages.

skills.name: Lonely duck cloud
skills.description: Ultimate: rush back from her front enemy dealing 250/375/500（+80% Phys）magic damages sending her umbrella in designated direction if she has it. Passive: when triggering her ability 阿离 can trigger it a second time to go to her umbrella spot. When she does not have her umbrella 阿离 gain 50 points move speed but has 20% reduced damages.

skills.name: Moonlight dance
skills.description: Passive: One her first attackagainst a target, Luna will teleport towards it"s position. On her third attack she will deal extra damages and mark the target.

skills.name: Halfmoon cut
skills.description: Luna will make a shockwave in the designated direction dealing 350/430/510/590/670/750（+51% Magic) magic damages and marking hit enemies.

skills.name: Earth thrust
skills.description: Luna strike the earth and pull nearby enemies, dealing 120/135/150/165/180/195（+31% Magic）magic damages stunning them 0.5s and marking them. She will also gain a shield blocking 400/480/560/640/720/800（+80% Magic）damages slowing her for 2s of 50 of her movement speed.

skills.name: New moon assault
skills.description: Ultimate: Luna will charge in the designated direction dealing 500/625/750（+60% Magic) magic damages. if a marked target is hit, her new moon assault coolddown is reset.

skills.name: Dream eater
skills.description: Passive: 梦奇 progressively absorb surrounding nightmares to get bigger. On his fat form he gets 100 more power for 20s. In this form his attacks and abilities range are increased, he gets 150 more physical damages, 200 physical and magical reistance, 92 more health recovery and 200 move speed. Using abilities consume his power. In small form every 3rd basic attack deals more damage to enemies.

skills.name: Linger in dreamland
skills.description: 梦奇 get a shield preventing 525/630/735/840/945/1050（+120% Mag）damages. When appearing nearby enemies are dealt 350/420/490/560/630/700（+80% Mag）magic damages and slowed by 50% for 1.5s. 7s after trigger every 梦奇 third attack recover 5 power

skills.name: Dreamland crying
skills.description: 梦奇 send a receptacle dealing 200/250/300/350/400/450（+45% Mag）magic damages. The nightmare contained will remain on the floor 5s dealing every 0.5s 100/125/150/175/200/225（+22% Mag）magic damages and reduing enemy speed inside of 30% move speed. If 梦奇 touches the area he recover 2 nightmares

skills.name: Dreamland vortexs
skills.description: Ultimate: 梦奇 creates a nightmare whirlpool at the position. It deals 150/225/300（+30% Mag）magic damages every 0.5s to enemy within and lower their move speed by 50%. Upon ending or on trigger, will be transported to the location and deal 300/450/600（+60% Mag）magic damages and making them fly for 1s. This can be interrupted and in that case get 1/3 of the cooldown. 梦奇 needs 1/3 of his power to be transported. Passive: When an enemy his hit by nightmares he get a stask of it. Each one lessening his magic resistance by 8% up to 5 stacks.

skills.name: Ethernal blood
skills.description: Passive: When triggering an ability 芈月 spawn a shadow servant (up to 6) attacking nearby enemies for 40（+7% Magic）magic damages and healing Miyue of 20（+3% Magic）health. When spawning a servant MiYue gain 30 shadow force. When out of shadow force all her servants disappear.

skills.name: Shock of pain
skills.description: 芈月 release shadows in the specified direction dealing 200/220/240/260/280/300（+24% Magic）magic damages when activated a second time, MiYue will teelport to the shadow dealing 200/220/240/260/280/300（+24% Magic）to nearby enemies. If so she will spawn a servant

skills.name: Illusionary servant
skills.description: 芈月 release a shadow chain in specified direction lasting at most 4s, stealing to the first target hit 15（+2% Magic）life, 10 physical damages and 30 magic damages and dealing 50/60/70/80/90/100（+7% Magic). If the link is maintained, MiYue will spawn a servant

skills.name: Moon shadow
skills.description: Ultimate: 芈月 escape in the shadow 2s gaining 30%seed and become immune to any effect. Upon start and termination, she deals 400/500/600（+50% Magic）magic damages to nearby enemies if she deals damage to an enemy coing back she will spawn a shadow servant. Passive: MiYue attacks deal 40（+100 Physical）（+20%Magic) damages slow enemies of 10% adnd generate 10 Shadow force

skills.name: Flowing blade technique
skills.description: Passive: Each 娜可露露 ability hitting an enemy will grand next basic attack 80（+100% Phys）additinoal physical damages

skills.name: Eagle attack
skills.description: 娜可露露 rush towards the designated enemy dealing 350/400/450/500/550/600（+155% Phys）physical damages and marking the target. Basic attack trigger the marks dealing 8% of the target max health as physical damages. every 40 additional damages dealt, her attack is increased by 1%. Triggering Eale attack mark reduces it's cooldown by 3s and recovers 35 Magic power.

skills.name: Wind blade
skills.description: 娜可露露 sprint in the direction dealing 350/420/490/560/630/700（+170% Phys）physical damages to enemies encountered. She will recover 250/300/350/400/450/500（+100% Phys）health for each enemy hit.

skills.name: Eagle assault
skills.description: Ultimate: 娜可露露 summon an eagle for 6s increasing her move speed by 50% (progressively attenuated). On second trigger she will launch an attack in the area dealing 600/850/1100（+265% Phys）physical damages to enemies lowering their damages by 30% and slowing them of 50% of their move speed for 3s

skills.name: lorious guide
skills.description: Passive: Every time she level up, 女娲 gain 3% vision range (up tyo 42%). Her attacks and abilities also gain 2% range (up to 28%). Her abilities mark enemies. Marks are triggered by friendly (including Nvwa herself) attacks and abilities dealing more damage and increasing source ally movement speed by 16% for 2s and recovering life (Maximum 40 (+ 12% Magic)) only once every 0.5s

skills.name: Order: radiate
skills.description: 女娲 release energy along the directed path dealing 250/290/330/370（+36% Magic）magic damages to enemies.When hitting an enemy the wave stops and unfold a cross shape area dealing the same damage to enemies within.

skills.name: Order: create
skills.description: 女娲 creates a block at the expected position preventing enemies to go through during 3s. When disappearing or if another of her ability hit the area, it will explode dealing 500/580/660/740（+80% Magic）magic damages to nearby enemies. Whenever she gains 100 Magic, the box duration will increase by 0.2s. (Max 4 boxes at the same time)

skills.name: Order: move
skills.description: 女娲 will teleport to the designated place after a short chant dealing 500/560/620/680（+65% Magic）magic damages to nearby enemies. Passive she will gain a shield from from enemies touched protecting her from 400/480/560/640（+80% Magic）damages from these enemies. When the shield takes damages Nvwa gain 30% move speed for 2s

skills.name: Order destroy
skills.description: 女娲 release a bolt of energy in the direction after a short incantation dealing 700/1050/1400（+88% Magic）magic damages

skills.name: God Power
skills.description: Passive: Each time 孙悟空 trigger an ability his next attack gain strength dealing 210 (+140% Phys) physical damages if it hits. 孙悟空 have 20% more chance to trigger critical attacks but they deal only 150% damages.

skills.name: Magical body protection
skills.description: 孙悟空 get a protection blocking an ability for at most 1s. If triggered he gains for 0.25s unrivaled ability protecting up. To 500/600/700/800/900/1000 health damages during 4s.孙悟空 will also get 40% increased speed after trigger

skills.name: Charge
skills.description: 孙悟空 will charge in the given direction and jump on the first enemy met. attacking or using an ability stop the charge.

skills.name: Goldband wish
skills.description: Ultimate: 孙悟空 summon his goldband stick dealing 150/190/230（+50% Phys）physical damages to enemies in the area and stunning them for 1s. it also marks enemies nearby with 3 marks each.孙悟空 attacks on a marked target will consume one mark and deal an additional 120~450 physical damages (damage is increased according to the hero level)

skills.name: Frozen heart
skills.description: Passive: When out of combat for 3s 王昭君 will get an ice shield protecting 450 (+ 52% of her magic) damages. Upon breaking the shield will deal 450 (+52% magic) damage to nearby enemies and slow them down 1s at 50% of their move speed

skills.name: Withering cristals
skills.description: 王昭君 creates a burst of ice dealing 400/480/560/640/720/800（+65%法术加成）magic damage and slowing affected enemies 2s for 50% of theirmovement speed.

skills.name: Frost coffin
skills.description: 王昭君 will create a pillar of ice after a small cooldown on the designated area dealing 250/280/310/340/370/400（+47% magic）magic damages. targets in range upon trigger will be frozen for 2.5s. They will also suffer of 250/280/310/340/370/400（+50%magix damage）form WangZhaoJun

skills.name: Winter is coming
skills.description: Ultimate: 王昭君 will trigger a blizzard at her position dealing 300/375/450（+50% magic）magic damages every 0.5s for 4.7s to enemies in range and slowing them of 30% of their move speed for 1s. She will also gain her Ice shield upon trigger blocking 600 Physical damages.

skills.name: God awakening
skills.description: Passive: When Dying Diana is replaced by an etheral form that can freely move. Both side see this form. Upon resurection Diana will reappear at her form position. Allied heroes have increased 20% move speed. As god Diana gain 25% damages against small enemies.

skills.name: Divine march
skills.description: Diana dashes in the given direction dealing 290/350/410/470/530/590（+63％ Phys）magic damages and pushes back enemies on the way. Diana will also get a shield preventing crowd control and blocking 375/465/555/645/735/825（+82％Phys）damages for 1s.

skills.name: Link spear
skills.description: Diana jump in the direction and get a bayonet for her next attack dealing 290（+145％ Phys）physical damages. Upon 3 successfull Diana bayonet will pierce armors deling to enemy health 25% physical damage. Armor piercing can happen only once every 5s. If Divine march or Holy shield hit an enemy, Link spear cooldown will be reduced by 4s.

skills.name: Holy shield
skills.description: Ultimate: Diana will get a huge Holy shield protecting from 1100/1650/2200(+150％ Phys）damages and granting crowd control protection for 1.5s. Upon Disparition, Shield will deal 450/650/850（+150％ Phys）magic damages to nearby enemies and slow them by 50% for 1s.

skills.name: Graceful move
skills.description: Passive: When switching song 杨玉环 get different effects. Destruction: All enemies in a 800 range suffer 75 (+15% Mag) magic damages, minions suffer an additional 75% damages. serenity: all allies within 800 range get 50 (+10% Mag) health upon trigger

skills.name: Nichang song
skills.description: 杨玉环 send 3 sound waves. Each will slowly move toward nearby enemi and deal 200/240/280/320/360/400（+33% Mag）magic damages and lessen move speed by 50% for 1s. After release 杨玉环 next attack will deal an additional 225/270/315/360/405/450（+36% Mag）magic damages and lessen 杨玉环 cooldows by 1s.

skills.name: Hu melody
skills.description: 杨玉环 will gain 50% move speed for 1.5s. after 1.5s enemies within 600~800 from 杨玉环 will suffer 250/300/350/400/450/500（+40% Mag）magic damages and be stunned for 0.75s.

skills.name: Sorrow's song
skills.description: 杨玉环 jump in the air becoming untargetable. At the end of the song, allies within 500 will recover 750/1100/1450（+80% Mag）health and enemies will suffer 500/750/1000（+75% Mag）magic damages

skills.name: Tree god blessing
skills.description: Passive: After entering combat, next attack will deal an additional 200(+200% Phsy) physical damages and slow the target move speed by 90% for 1.5s.

skills.name: Rise
skills.description: will thrown a spear in the given direction dealing 365/475/585/695/805/915 (+180% Phys) physical damages. Each hero hit afterwards will recived 15% less damage than the previous for a minimum of 40%.

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: gain 30/36/42/48/54/60% move speed for 2s During this time will avoid all physical damages. Other  abilities will cancel this effect.

skills.name: Front wave dance
skills.description: Ultimate:  will jump at her target stunning it for 0.5s. She will afterwards leap backwards sending in her target direction to projectiles dealing 220/280/340 (+120 Phys) physical damages. At her leap point,  is immuned to crowd control.

skills.name: Jin"s dynasty smelting
skills.description: Passive: when hit by an enemy the attacker have 50% chance of being stoned for 1s. A hero cannot be affected more than once every 8s.

skills.name: Hurricane dash
skills.description: 钟无艳 rush in the specified direction. Her next attack will deal 225/270/315/360/405/450（+120% Physical）physical damage and leave the target stunned for 2s

skills.name: Intimidation hit
skills.description: 钟无艳 slam her sledehammer on the ground dealing 350/420/490/560/630/700（+150% Physical）physical damages to target in range. Targets in the center will suffer double damages

skills.name: Hurricane hammer
skills.description: Ultimate: 钟无艳 turn with her hammer for 3.2s dealing 150/200/250（+80%物理加成）physical damage every 0.4s. Enemy in the outer range will receive an additional 40% damage. Passive: ZhongwuYan summon a rock shield protecting her from 80/120/160(+35% Physical) damages.
